de.dlr.proseo.usermgr.rest.model.RestUser

  • Packages that use RestUser 
    Package Description
    de.dlr.proseo.usermgr.rest
    RESTful interface for the prosEO User Manager component

    • Uses of RestUser in de.dlr.proseo.usermgr.rest

      Methods in de.dlr.proseo.usermgr.rest that return RestUser 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      RestUser UserManager.createUser​(RestUser restUser)
      Create a user (optionally with direct authorities)
      RestUser UserManager.getUserByName​(String username)
      Get a user by name
      RestUser UserManager.modifyUser​(String username, RestUser restUser)
      Update a user by user name If the password is changed, the password expiration date will be updated according to the password expiration period configured.
      (package private) static RestUser UserManager.toRestUser​(User modelUser)
      Convert a user from prosEO data model format to REST format (including directly assigned authorities)
